Bash("$GH" issue edit 5 --title "Add AWS CLI v2 with SSM Plugin and AWS tools for cloud integration" --body "## Problem
The development container lacks AWS CLI tools needed for cloud integration, including:
- AWS CLI v2 for general AWS service interaction
- AWS SSM CLI plugin for Secrets Manager and Parameter Store
- RDS CLI tools for database management
- Other AWS development tools

## Solution
Install comprehensive AWS tooling in the DevContainer:
1. AWS CLI v2 - Core AWS command line interface
2. AWS SSM Session Manager Plugin - For secure connections and secrets management
3. AWS RDS tools - For RDS database operations

## Requirements
- Install AWS CLI v2 in Dockerfile
- Install Session Manager plugin for AWS SSM
- Configure AWS credentials handling (via environment variables or mounted .aws directory)
- Add documentation for AWS tool usage
- Ensure tools work with postgres user permissions

## Use Cases
- Access AWS Secrets Manager for secure credential storage
- Connect to RDS instances via SSM
- Backup Babelfish data to S3
- Manage AWS resources from DevContainer
- Use Parameter Store for configuration management

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] AWS CLI v2 is installed and functional
- [ ] SSM Session Manager plugin is installed
- [ ] AWS credentials can be configured securely
- [ ] Documentation includes AWS setup instructions
- [ ] Tools work properly with postgres user
- [ ] Example scripts for common AWS operations" -R $REPO)
